item.title: Drake Seeks Kendrick Lamar’s Contract, Evidence of Domestic Violence In Legal Fight
item.description: The Toronto rapper is also seeking documents over the value of Lamar’s recording catalogue.

item.title: Drake Brings Out Lauryn Hill for Night One of London Wireless Festival
item.description: The artists performed a surprise mashup of “Ex Factor” and “Nice For What” during the R&B-themed show.
